name: Element Defense
description:
This is our first game project for the university. It's a short tower defense with the topic human against nature. It has some little bugs, but we hope you can enjoy it.

Created by Jenny Gebauer, Oliver Hacker, Daniel Nepp and  Alexander Höllerer

Control

1 - PewPew

2 - Stampfi

3 - Granata

LMB - place the turret

RMB - delete the selection
